content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I try to control everything. I feel so nervous if I lose control of everyone and everything in my life.
That' s a really hard thing to hear. I' ve been on similar boat and have been in a similar place. Can you tell me more about your anxiety and fears?
I feel so down when I found I forgot somehting important to do.
I can see where that would be a very hard thing to process. It' s easy to lose interest in certain things, and it is harder when we tend to forget important things too.
